eventDecorators.name: DAppCreated
eventDecorators.description: events for transfer. Emitted when maximum value of ETH is raised.

eventDecorators.name: Upvote
eventDecorators.description: events for transfer. Emitted when maximum value of ETH is raised.

eventDecorators.name: Downvote
eventDecorators.description: events for transfer. Emitted when maximum value of ETH is raised.

eventDecorators.name: Withdraw
eventDecorators.description: events for transfer. Emitted when maximum value of ETH is raised.

eventDecorators.name: MetadataUpdated
eventDecorators.description: events for transfer. Emitted when maximum value of ETH is raised.

eventDecorators.name: CeilingUpdated
eventDecorators.description: events for transfer. Emitted when maximum value of ETH is raised.

functionDecorators.name: withdraw
functionDecorators.description: Developers can withdraw an amount not more than what was available of the SNT they originally staked minus what they have already received back in downvotes.

parameterDecorators.name: _amount
parameterDecorators.description: of tokens to withdraw from DApp's overall balance.

functionDecorators.name: upvoteEffect
functionDecorators.description: Used in UI to display effect on ranking of user's donation.

parameterDecorators.name: _amount
parameterDecorators.description: of tokens to stake/"donate" to this DApp's ranking.

functionDecorators.name: upvote
functionDecorators.description: Sends SNT directly to the contract, not the developer. This gets added to the DApp's balance, no curve required.

parameterDecorators.name: _amount
parameterDecorators.description: of tokens to stake on DApp's ranking. Used for upvoting + staking more.

parameterDecorators.name: _newController
parameterDecorators.description: The new controller of the contract.

functionDecorators.name: getDAppsCount
functionDecorators.description: Used in UI in order to fetch all dapps.

functionDecorators.name: downvoteCost
functionDecorators.description: Downvotes always remove 1% of the current ranking.

functionDecorators.name: createDApp
functionDecorators.description: Anyone can create a DApp (i.e an arb piece of data this contract happens to care about).

parameterDecorators.name: _amount
parameterDecorators.description: of tokens to stake on initial ranking.

parameterDecorators.name: _amount
parameterDecorators.description: Amount being approved, needs to be equal `_amount` or `cost`.

parameterDecorators.name: _token
parameterDecorators.description: Token being approved, needs to be `SNT`.

parameterDecorators.name: _data
parameterDecorators.description: Abi encoded data with selector of `register(bytes32,address,bytes32,bytes32)`.

functionDecorators.name: downvote
functionDecorators.description: Sends SNT to the developer and lowers the DApp's effective balance by 1%.

functionDecorators.name: withdrawMax
functionDecorators.description: Developers can withdraw an amount not more than what was available of the SNT they originally staked minus what they have already received back in downvotes.

functionDecorators.name: setMetadata
functionDecorators.description: dev Set the content for the dapp.
